# Request for Proposal (RFP): Analysis of Remote Pilot Aircraft Systems (RPAS) and the Transportation of Dangerous Goods
## Publication Date: 2022-09-01

* [English Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/01/805ac3faa31cb2c13ac83b0757771d30/rfp_t8080-220178.pdf)
* [French Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/01/8f6b0f3a176648c0b626ed5b9958cfdb/rfp_fr_t8080-220178.pdf)

Transport Canada, located at 330 Sparks St, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0N5, Canada, is requesting a proposal for a research contract to analyze the applicability of Remote Pilot Aircraft Systems (RPAS) in the transportation of dangerous goods in Canada.

## Project Overview

The use of RPAS is rapidly growing globally, with multi-sector applications in agriculture, delivery, mining, scientific research, security, and law enforcement. However, slow regulatory development may create a barrier for economic growth and future development of the technology. This research project aims to provide information and analysis on the type of dangerous goods, and industries related to dangerous goods, which have the greatest interest and applicability to be moved by RPAS in Canada.

## Research Objectives

* Provide a review of RPAS applicability in Canada, specifically focused on the movement of dangerous goods
* Conduct an overview of international RPAS legislation related to dangerous goods
* Gather pertinent accident/incident information from international sources
* Assist in moving towards risk-based analysis of RPAS
* Provide early information related to accident reporting of this specific transportation method

## Eligibility and Guidelines

Transport Canada invites proposals from qualified consultants to undertake this research project. The proposal should include a detailed methodology, timeline, and budget for the project.

## Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical merit and relevance of the proposal
* Expertise and experience of the consultant team
* Methodology and approach outlined in the proposal
* Budget and timeline proposed by the consultant team

## Closing Date and Time

The proposal submission deadline is 2022-10-11 at 14:00:00.
